property.name: Card Text
property.value:
While you control no non-[ cards, Watcher of Signs gains an % icon.
Response: After a DISASTER card is played, choose a resource and move it to another domain controlled by the same player.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After a CULTIST leaves play, draw 1 card. Limit 3 times per turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent has committed at least 1 character to a story, exhaust Mariner to commit it and all uncommitted characters to a single story. At the end of the phase, sacrifice Mariner if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When an opponent’s card would go to the discard pile, instead put that card on the bottom of its owner’s deck. Then, Black Winged One gains a # icon until the end of the phase. Limit once per phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Obsessive Zealot leaves play, choose 1 character. That character goes insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While you control no non-[ cards, Akhlut gains a @ icon and other Monster characters you control gain # # icons.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While you control no non-[ cards, Asuilaak gains a @ icon and other Cultist characters you control gain an $ icon.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Bone Sculptor and pay X (minimum of 1) to choose 1 character in any discard pile with a cost of X or lower. Put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase remove it from the game. Limit once per turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a non-ANCIENT ONE character. Put that character and Dwellers Bellow on the bottom of its owner’s decks.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After characters uncommit from a story, choose and destroy the character with the lowest cost.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you play a CULTIST character, Henry Anthony Wilcox gains INVULNERABILITY, and CULTIST characters you control gain a @ icon until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When you play Ruinous Star Spawn, you may sacrifice X CULTIST characters to lower Ruinous Star Spawn’s cost by X.
Response: After you play Ruinous Star Spawn, choose a story. Remove all success tokens from the chosen story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: After you play Fiona Day, sacrifice X other CULTIST characters to place X success tokens on 1 story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When Hunting Wendigo would be destroyed, instead discard all wound tokens and attachments from it and attach it as a Dormant card at a story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play Followers of R’lyeh by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Forced Response: After you play Followers of R’lyeh, each player sacrifices 2 non-CULTIST characters that he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When you play Kassogtha, you may sacrifice X CULTIST characters to lower Kassogtha’s cost by X.
Forced Response: After you play Kassogtha, choose 1 character, 1 support card, and 1 conspiracy, if able. Destroy all chosen cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: After you play Cthulhu, discard up to 3 total resources from your domains. Each player must sacrifice each character and support card he controls of cost X or lower. X is the number of resources discarded in this way.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Horrific Statuette to choose 1 CULTIST character. Choose an icon type and change any number of that character’s icons to that icon type.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to a story card.
Forced Response: The player who lost the skill check at the attached story must sacrifice a non-[ character committed to this story, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a character would be sacrificed, pay 1 to put a CULTIST character from your hand into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character is destroyed, look at the top 4 cards of your deck and arrange them in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Forced Response: When you exhaust a CULTIST character, place 1 success token on Summon the Sleeper.
Action: Sacrifice Summon the Sleeper and discard 5 success tokens from it to search your deck for a SERVITOR or ANCIENT ONE, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: During the operations phase, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a CULTIST character, you may play that card as if it were in your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Players must pay 1 as an additional cost to play an event card. Each player may ignore this effect if he controls 2 or more CULTIST characters.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Irem to have each player sacrifice all but 2 characters he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Ignore the resource match requirement of the next character card you play this phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Play only during the story phase.
Action: Drain all domains.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character commits to a story, its controller must either discard 1 of his success tokens from that story or discard a card from his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Put any number of CULTIST characters with a combined printed cost of 3 or lower from your discard pile into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Each player skips his next refresh phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Put a DORMANT character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, attach it as a DORMANT card at a story where you have no success tokens, otherwise remove it from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and put all characters revealed into play. Return all other cards to the top of your deck in the same order.

card.name: Raising of the Great Old One

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Characters that are made insane at this conspiracy are destroyed. Characters wounded by losing the # struggle at this conspiracy are attached to a domain of their owner’s choosing instead of being destroyed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Kelly McIlhenney commits to a story add 1 success token to her. Action: Sacrifice Kelly McIlhenney to search your deck for a character with cost X or less and put it in your hand. X is the number of success tokens on Kelly McIlhenney.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Attach to an opponent’s discard pile.
Disrupt: When a card would enter the attached discard pile, instead remove it from the game. Then, place 1 success token on Even Death May Die.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a card effect would cause any number of characters you control to leave play, instead choose and drive any number of those characters insane to cancel the effect on that character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent triggers a card effect that targets a card you control, refresh a domain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play The Peel Association by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Response: After you play The Peel Association, choose a domain. Turn each resource attached to that domain facedown. They are now considered to provide only neutral resources.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you commit Ardois-Bonnot to a non-conspiracy story, drive him insane to trigger the effect of that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play Sons of Carcosa by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Response: After a player readies one or more cards outside of the refresh phase, he must make a character he controls go insane, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you would place a success token at a story at which Professor William Webb is committed, you may instead place that success token at another story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play US Archaeological Society by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Response: After you place 1 or more success tokens at a story at which US Archaeological Society is committed, put a Lost Civilization location into play from your hand or your discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Budding Dark Young leaves play, put into play from your hand a Dark Young character with skill 3 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play The Shepherds by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Response: After you place 1 or more success tokens at a story at which The Shepherds is committed, choose a character attached to one of your domains as a resource and put it on the top of your deck.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Theosophist to choose a non-neutral resource and name a faction. Until the end of the phase, that resource is now considered a match for the chosen faction instead of its printed faction.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Return Professor George Angell to your hand to cancel an effect just triggered.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play H.O.S.T. by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Action: Return a LODGE character to your hand. Then, draw 1 card. Limit 3 times per turn.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character you control is destroyed, exhaust The Tablets of Nhing to put into play a character from your hand whose cost is lower than the destroyed character. Then, place 1 success token on The Tablets of Nhing.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive any number of characters you control insane whose total icons include ##$$$%% to search your deck for an Ancient One and put it into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: While St. Claire is committed to a story, only characters with a skill of 3 or higher count their icons during struggles at that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play Hip Sing Tong by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
Forced Response: After a character’s skill has been reduced to 0, exhaust it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a player draws 1 or more cards through a card effect, search your deck for a SORCERER character, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Reduce the cost to play Guardians of the Gate by 2 for each story card in an opponent’s won pile.
During each player’s draw phase, instead of drawing 2 cards, that player draws 1 card and then discards 1 card from the top of his deck.
